testsuite.name: LearningProgressTrackerTest

testcase.name: start

failure.message:
java.lang.AssertionError: Presentation error in test #23
The following output contains wrong number of lines (expected to be equal to 1, found 2): Incorrect points format. Enter an id and points or 'back' to return:
Please find below the output of your program during this failed test. Note that the '>' character indicates the beginning of the input line.
---
Learning Progress Tracker > > add students Enter student credentials or 'back' to return:> Brandise Hardan address1@mail.com The student has been added. > Charlena Girardo address2@mail.com The student has been added. > Emelia Annnora address3@mail.com The student has been added. > Dolley Panther address4@mail.com The student has been added. > Shoshana Utica address5@mail.com The student has been added. > Lebbie Alabaster address6@mail.com The student has been added. > back Total 6 students have been added.> list Students: 10000 10001 10002 10003 10004 10005 > add points Enter an id and points or 'back' to return:> 10000 Incorrect points format. Enter an id and points or 'back' to return:
